definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Thaksin and his wife, Pojaman, were in Beijing until Sunday for the opening of the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 他信夫婦在北京參加奧運開幕式，一直逗留到星期天。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他給老婆買精緻的瓷器，星期天下午帶她散很長的步。

sentences.english: She goes to church every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 她每個星期天都去做禮拜。

sentences.english: One Sunday, Jane and Alice went outside for shopping.
sentences.chinese: 一個星期天，簡和愛麗斯一起去購物。

sentences.english: The bloom is set to wilt late Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 花將會在星期六晚些時候或星期天凋謝。

sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，爸爸媽媽和我去牡丹園遊玩。

sentences.english: I hope I can meet you at Jack's home on Sunday. Allright?
sentences.chinese: 我希望星期天能在傑克家裏見到你。行嗎？

sentences.english: She's the literary editor of the 'Sunday Review '.
sentences.chinese: 她是《星期天評論》的文學編輯。

sentences.english: On Sunday morning we had singing lessons with Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 星期天的早晨，我們上毗溼紐的歌唱課。

sentences.english: I guess we have to stay home this Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我想這個星期天我們得呆在家裏。

sentences.english: We‘ve received the sample which you sent us last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經收到了上星期天你方寄來的樣品。

sentences.english: We're going to the East Lake Park on Sunday. Will you join us?
sentences.chinese: 我們打算星期天去東湖公園。你跟我們一道去好嗎？

sentences.english: He works every day but Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 除星期天外，他每天都工作。

sentences.english: Once a week. I usually go to see them on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 一星期一次，我通常每個星期天都去看他們。

sentences.english: We are always shorthanded on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是在星期天缺人手。

sentences.english: The document was first reported on Sunday by The Detroit News.
sentences.chinese: 這份陳述首次由《底特律消息》在星期天刊報道。
